Reviews.Title: Ripoff
Reviews.Author: bojabr
Reviews.Content: do not be fooled by this product !some peaces fall apart when unpakingi didn't get the following1- Pack of LCD Screen Protectors1- Lens/LCD Cleaning Kit1- Mini Table Top Tripodthe (Rapid Home and Car Charger) won't work on original batteriesi wouldn't have payed 10$ for the hole thing *(i wouldn't even buy it)all cheapest you can imagenthe seller was Sunset Electronics.

Reviews.Title: missed items
Reviews.Author: Luis Jose Morales
Reviews.Content: The accessories arrived without two items the cleaner kit and the skin protector,also looks like a chinese stuff, but for the price??

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: Everything in the package seems to work ok. But you can tell it's not the greatest quality (Zeikos brand).Anyway, for the money it's a great starters kit

Reviews.Title: This sucks
Reviews.Author: Keith Bowman
Reviews.Content: This kit is terrible. The only benefit is the extra batteries and chargers. The tripods aren't strong enough to hold a hot wheels car. The bag has a gassy odor. I've soaked it in downy fabric softener and washed it 3 times and it won't go away. The flash doesn't work like its supposed to. Just a waste.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: KENYA O.
Reviews.Content: Not made well bad product cheap. The only good thing I got out of this is the battery,  every thing did not come with it like the mono pod.

Reviews.Title: Not bad, might be better off shopping for items separately.
Reviews.Author: Andrea G. Spivey
Reviews.Content: This isn't a bad kit, but I haven't tested everything out yet.  All of the items are on the cheaper side and you might get a better deal if you bought the items separately.  That being said, it's an easy way to try some of the lenses and filters out.  The bag is kind of cheap, I will probably buy a better one soon.

Reviews.Title: That will do pig that will do
Reviews.Author: Phobby
Reviews.Content: So beyond the package wich looked like crap when recived ( delivered by UPS) the batteries have served well so far have not had any issue with original batteries or chargers workin with either or, the lenses both have been fun, the images of the product seem a little miss leading the bag is small ad barely fits the camera with a lense attached. The card reader was diffrent as well as the tripod, but hey I did not expect alot, I was missing the filters, shortly after contacting them I recived an email apologizing for the missing items and that they were shipping out ASAP.This pack is great for the inspired and beginer photographer, Not for pro!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Martin Guzman "MGuzman"
Reviews.Content: I received the items in a very timely manner and was very pleased with the products. They all worked as stated, would recommend this package.

ProductInfo.Features:
EVERYTHING IN THIS KIT IS BRAND NEW ITEMS WITH ALL MANUFACTURER SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES + FULL USA WARRANTIES
Wide Angle Macro and 2x Telephoto Zoom Lenses and 3 Piece Filter Kit
2 Replacement Extended Life BattERIES+ External A/C- D/C Car Charger + Flash
8GB SD Memory Card with Card Reader +FLASH
Soft carrying Case and Full Size Tripod
ProductInfo.Name: Huge Ultimate Accessory Kit for the Canon T3i & T2i Digital Slr Camera.the Kit Includes Lenses, Filters, 8gb Sd Card, 2 Extended Life Batteries , Carrying Case, Tripod, Flash Plus Much More!! These Lenses and Filters Will Attach to Any of the Following Canon Lenses 18-55mm, 75-300mm, 50mm 1.4 , 55-200mm.
